article_title: Steve Forbes' Plan to Revive America: Drop Obamacare, Flatten Tax Code
article_text:
Give to Charity Through a Donor-Advised Fund With Tax Advantages

Donating to charity is a virtuous thing to do, but giving straight cash is not always the best way to do it.

article_metadata.description: America has lost its "mojo" and the best way to regain it is by reforming taxes, health care and the Federal Reserve, said Steve Forbes, author of Reviving America.
article_metadata.author: Gregg Greenberg
